body.name: ZealSound Gaming USB Pink Microphone with Quick Mute for Phone Computer PC PS5,Studio Mic with Gain Control,Echo&Monitor Volume Adjust for Streaming Vocal Recording ASMR Podcast Video K66
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins
features: [Right Out-of-the-Box] The USB gaming microphone for PC is compatible with Windows, Mac OS/PS4/PS5. Quickly enter game chat with iPhone / Type C Phone /iPad / Android Tablet with the ADAPTER FOR IPHONE and Type C to USB adapter (INCLUDE). The plug-and-play gaming microphone set podcast equipment bundle is no need additional setup steps. Easy to start your video content creation and get social with YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok, Twitch Podcasting.

[Natural Audio Clarity] Operated with 88db Dynamic Range and intelligent noise reduction chipset, the podcast mic delivers balanced audio range for smooth mid, bright high and stable bass. The Cardioid pattern is more sensitive, focused and rejection of rear sounds. It rejects unwanted off-axis noise for vocal originality and intelligibility during your podcasting and recording. (Tips: Top-address mic, face the top where is the capsules to pick up the audio source. Suggested range: 7.9-17.7".)

[Convenient Mic Gain Knob] This USB podcast microphone features a gain knob. Freely adjust the microphone volume and sensitivity during the recording process to get a great sound. Turn the gain down to effectively reduce room noise pick up, and counter-clockwise for more sensibility. The Echo function has a level control and can be turned off with the echo knob. LED mute reminder helps you get rid of forgetting to cancel the mute. Ideal for ASMR, Zoom meeting, remote work, streaming and gaming.

[Real-Time Monitor] This audio monitor microphone comes with 3.5mm headphone interface for direct and latency-free monitoring, which is useful for video creators to check if you're cutting off or if there's too much noise. Get the desired level via monitoring volume control when gaming recording and TikTok, YouTube, Zoom, FaceBook live streams. Achieve ideal volume, background, and error-free audio with this computer and iPhone microphone. Achieving higher audio quality and professionalism.

[38mm Large Top-Address Pickup Microphone] This top-address iPhone mic ensures best results when aimed at the sound source. For premium sound, speak directly into its top. Plus, the microphone is equipped with a 360-degree rotation feature, allowing you to adjust its position as needed and features a sturdy, all-metal heavy duty desktop base for added stability.The 38mm large pickup captures a broader range of sound frequencies and details, resulting in richer, more accurate audio.

[Useful Accessories] 1 x Solid built metal construction and anti-vibration stand base (avoid moving); 1 x Heavy-duty professional computer USB gaming top-address microphone-k66 series Pink color; 1 x 70.87 inch USB Audio Cable; 1 x Type C Adapter for the Newest MacBook and all other Type C devices (Phone, tablets and PC); 1 x Adapter for New iPhone and iPad Pro; 1 x Microphone Foam Windscreen (block blasting sound); 1 x User manual and free Technical Support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tailored for Your Podcasting and Audio Game Strong Compatibility with PC, Computer, Laptop, iPhone, Smartphone, iPad, PS 4&5. (TYPE-C ADAPTER & USB ADAPTER FOR IPHONE INCLUDE)

Professional Condenser Microphone No fixed angle restrictions Flexible and Sturdy Mic: 360-Degree Rotation and Weighted Base for Ideal Audio Output Stylish LED Indicator Total Control at Your Fingertips: Mic with Mute, Volume, Adjustable Echo, and Mic Volume for Optimal Monitoring No-Latency Monitor Immersive Voice Recording: No-Latency Monitoring and On-board Volume Control for Personalized Atmosphere. Noise Cancel Mode The noise-canceling function is initially off. Press and hold the mute button until it turns blue to activate noise cancel.

Seamless Compatibility: Connect All Your Devices with Ease This microphone comes with a USB adapter for use with iPhone and iPad Pro (iPhone 5 onwards and fourth-generation iPad onwards), as well as a Type-C adapter for use with all Type-C devices. And It is compatible with PS4, PS4 Pro, PS5, desktop computers, and laptops.

A microphone for all of your needs The noise-canceling function is initially disabled. To activate advanced noise cancellation, press and hold the mute button until it turns blue. Content creators, musicians, journalists, gamers, and anyone else in need of a noise-free recording environment can activate this feature.
Certified Performance: Elevate Your Recording with Certified Microphone

What is the difference between k66 blackout and pink edition? The paint finishing process for the pink microphone is more complex. First, a layer of white paint is applied to the mic, followed by a layer of pink powder coating using water-resistant paint. This is a purely handmade process. How does this microphone capture my voice? This top-address microphone captures sound directly in front of it using its diaphragm located at the top of the capsule, converting sound waves into an electrical signal. It's ideal for clear and focused sound capture in a studio setting. Does this microphone work with Android phones? Sure, it's compatiable with Android phones through the included TYPE-C ADAPTER. And ensure Your Android Device Supports OTG and make sure it's enabled before use, or Activate OTG as Needed. Does this pink microphone work with an iPad? This microphone includes a USB adapter for iPhone that allows it to be compatible with iPhone 5 onwards and iPad 4 onwards. Is the mic compatible with the Mac book? The microphone is fully compatible with Macbook and doesn't need any extra drivers. Please check your Mac settings to ensure that the microphone is recognized as an input source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Video Creator's Dream Mic - ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone, Pink Edition
reviews.reviewText: The ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone in pink has quickly become my go-to microphone for all my digital needs. As a lover of all things pink, this microphone is not only functional but also a stylish addition to my video creation & zoom needs.One of the highlights of this microphone is its superior sound quality. Whether I'm on a Zoom call, recording videos, or creating TikTok reels, the audio clarity is simply impeccable. My voice comes through crystal clear, without any background noise or interference, making my online interactions smooth and professional.The quick mute feature is another standout aspect of this microphone. It's perfect for those moments when you need to silence your audio quickly, ensuring interruptions don't derail my online activities.But let's talk about the aesthetics - it's adorable! The pink color is vibrant and fun, adding a pop of personality to my desk. As someone who appreciates the little details, I love how the pink hue adds a dash of charm without compromising the microphone's professional look.In conclusion, the ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone is a fantastic tool for anyone who values quality audio and a dash of style. It's reliable, user-friendly, and oh-so-pretty in pink. If you're looking for a microphone that delivers on all fronts, this is the one for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Mic with Great Sound Quality and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love the pink!! The instructions on the manual is easy to understand. It works on my MacBook and my phone. Remember to plug the headphones in for sound check. Great for content creators who’s just starting out with great quality mic without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First off, this did not take very long to get to my house, second of all the sound quality really good and this is a very affordable mic for someone that’s trying to start off cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a decent price
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is really good, it removes all the background noise and the mic is easy to setup and has instructions for windows and Mac. I tested it with and without the foam cover and I prefer how it sounds with the foam cover but the audio is clear regardless. As someone buying it as a first time, I’m satisfied with the purchase :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After receiving the product, I immediately filmed a podcast episode using this mic, and the durability is phenomenal and I also love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Sound is nice. Hooks up directly to your phone with no hassle. Would purchase again. Great for influencers

reviews.reviewText: Microphone was cool. The charger isn’t well made. It broke easily.

reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter she was so excited she used it for her YouTube Vlogs and it’s amazing. Great sound and picks up everything. It’s a definite keeper

reviews.reviewTitle: Elevate your content creation game with this microphone's exceptional quality, and durability
reviews.reviewText: Microphone Quality: 10/10Impressive sound crispiness and quality for the price.Frame: 9.5/10Resilient build; survived drops without dents or quality loss.Features: 9/10Convenient knobs for microphone, echo, and headphone control.Real-time adjustments for live recording, eliminating playback tweaks.Accessories: 8/10Includes USB C, A, and Lighting port adapters.Suggestion: Addition of a 3.5mm headphone jack for a complete package.Overall: 9.5/10Perfect for beginners entering content creation.Ideal for recording and understanding voice nuances.Experience crystal-clear sound and real-time adjustments without compromising on convenience. With a variety of adapters included, this microphone is a step towards perfection, though the addition of a 3.5mm headphone jack would make it truly comprehensive. Start your journey into content creation confidently and amplify your voice with this solid offering, perfect for beginners and self-recording enthusiasts alike.

The product came with everything mentioned. It was easy to setup and has simple instructions on how to use. The quality of the material used is good, does not feel cheap. The microphone quality is great can pick up my voice clearly. The product is a great buy, especially for the price.
It’s worth the money. The quality is very good. Able to apply both computer and phones. Clear sound. And able to use both iPhone and android.

Love this mic. I got it for my podcast. Just plugged the usb c cable into my MacBook and off I went. Easy peasy. The sound quality is superb. You can plug in headphones straight into the base. Makes listening to yourself and blocking outside distractions much easier. Very easy to change the angle of the mic. Just loosen the knobs on either end and swivel to your desired position. I don’t know how it will handle prolonged use or if the quality will stand up over time but right now I couldn’t ask for more. Especially at this price point. Under $50. I’ve used one of the “brand name” mics that was over $100 and it couldn’t even connect to a computer half of the time. So happy with this purchase.
